actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans with service-connected disabilities rates as total to domestic and overseas travel on military aircraft on a space-available basis.

summary.text: Entitles veterans with service-connected disabilities rated as total to domestic and overseas travel on military aircraft on a space-available basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans with service-connected disabilities rates as total to domestic and overseas travel on military aircraft on a space-available basis.
